name: Oh Where Oh Where Has My Little Dog Gone
lyric:
Oh where oh where
Has my little dog gone
Oh where oh where can he be

With his ears cut short
And his tail cut long
Oh where oh where is he

Oh where oh where
Has my little dog gone
Oh where oh where can he be

With his ears cut short
And his tail cut long
Oh where oh where is he

author.name: 虾米用户
author.motto: 一个脱离了搞基趣味的人

comments.brief:
是不是主人真得丢过小狗，所以写出了这样一首歌曲，莫名伤感。希望小迪，你现在要好好的吧！别人能好好善待你。我的黑色小泰迪。

来自iPhone客户端
